functions.name: decode
functions.description:
Decode a base64Binary.

The function assumes that the content after decoding is valid UTF-8.

parameters.name: base64
parameters.description: The base64Binary item to decode

functions.name: decode
functions.signature: ($base64 as base64Binary, $encoding as string) as string external
functions.description:
Decode a base64Binary.

The function assumes that the content after decoding has the given encoding.

parameters.name: base64
parameters.description: The base64Binary item to decode

parameters.name: encoding
parameters.description: The encoding of the string after base64-decoding it. The encoding parameter is case insensitive.

returns.description: the base64-decoded value as a string

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZXQP0006 if the given encoding is invalid or not supported. "ASCII" and "UTF-8" are guaranteed to be supported; other encodings may be supported depending on the installation.</xqdoc:error>

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The item whose string-value should be encoded

returns.description: the base64-encoded string-value of the item parameter
